identity.name: SG Siemens München Ost e.V. - Digital Experience
identity.theme_strategy: Dark Mode Default (The 'Stadium at Night' Aesthetic)
principles: Motion is Energy: The site must feel like a match in progress.
Data is Art: Player stats and grids should look like trading cards, not spreadsheets.
Community First: The 'Verein' is the hero, not just the 1st team.

rules.headings: Uppercase, tracking-tight, heavy weights (700/800). Use for Section Titles and Player Names.
rules.body: High legibility, relaxed line-height. Use for news and bios.
rules.numbers: Use 'Barlow Condensed' for jersey numbers and scores.

gradients.card_glow: radial-gradient(circle at top right, rgba(29, 78, 216, 0.15), transparent 40%)

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle noise texture (opacity 0.03) over the #020617 background to prevent 'digital flatness'.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.08) for cards. No heavy shadows.
visual_enhancers.glass: backdrop-blur-md bg-slate-950/80 border-b border-white/10 for the Sticky Header.

hero.layout: Full-screen background image with heavy bottom gradient fade.
hero.content: Big bold text 'SG SIEMENS MÜNCHEN OST'. Subtext 'Tradition trifft Zukunft'. CTA Group.

squad_grid.instruction: Do NOT use equal sized cards. Create a masonry-like feel.
squad_grid.card_style: Image top (grayscale on idle, color on hover), Name bottom (Oswald), Number absolute top-right (Yellow).
squad_grid.layout_rules: Captain card spans 2 cols. Goalkeeper card is tall (row-span-2).

news_feed.layout: Left: Featured Article (Large). Right: Vertical list of recent updates + Instagram feed integration.
news_feed.instagram_style: Grid of square images with hover overlay showing likes/comments.

footer.content: Club Address, Quick Links, Sponsors Grid (grayscale logos), Social Icons.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons (Menu, Chevron, User, Calendar).

setup: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the custom colors (Midnight Pitch, Electric Royal, Cyber Gold).
Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css'.
anti_patterns: NO pure black (#000000) backgrounds - use Slate-950.
NO Inter font for Headings - use Oswald.

general: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
component_reuse: Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed.
export_conventions: Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...).
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...}).
